summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4431 for the improvement of the alley in Block 4, Hillman City Addition, Division No. 5, being the alley between Rainier Avenue and 44th Avenue South, from Juneau Street to Denny Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52336, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
